gmd:statement.gco:CharacterString: Fri Apr 18 09:13:07 2014: ncap2 -O -S /zeus/d2/usl/ncap2.nco temp.nc temp.nc Fri Apr 18 09:13:07 2014: ncks -d node,97,19700 -d node,19703,19719 -d node,19723,19731 -d nele,180,35028 -d nele,35032,35061 -d nele,35067,35083 /zeus/d2/usl/nowcast/2014/output/netcdf/201410721.nc temp.nc Fri Apr 18 09:12:51 2014: ncap2 -O -s nprocs=nprocs;partition=partition;x=x;y=y;where(lon>0.0) lon=lon-360; usl_0001.nc usl_0001.nc model started at: 18/04/2014 04:10
